00015 #import <AppKit/AppKit.h>
00016 
00017 @interface KFSplitView:NSSplitView
00018 {
00019     // retained
00020     NSMutableSet *kfCollapsedSubviews;
00021     NSMutableArray *kfDividerRects;
00022     NSString *kfPositionAutosaveName;
00023     NSCursor *kfIsVerticalResizeCursor;
00024     NSCursor *kfNotIsVerticalResizeCursor;
00025 
00026     // not retained
00027     NSCursor *kfCurrentResizeCursor;
00028     NSUserDefaults *kfDefaults;
00029     NSNotificationCenter *kfNotificationCenter;
00030     BOOL kfIsVertical;
00031     id kfDelegate;
00032 }
00033 
00034 // sets the collapse-state of a subview, which is completely independent
00035 // of that subview's frame (as in NSSplitView).  (Sometime) after calling this
00036 // you'll need to tell the splitview to resize its subviews.
00037 // Normally, that would be this call:
00038 //    [kfSplitView resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:[kfSplitView bounds].size];
00039 - (void)setSubview:(NSView *)subview isCollapsed:(BOOL)flag;
00040 
00041 // To find documentation for these methods refer to Apple's NSWindow
00042 // documentation for the corresponding methods (e.g. -setFrameAutosaveName:).
00043 // To use an autosave name, call -setPositionAutosaveName: from the -awakeFromNib
00044 // method of a controller.
00045 + (void)removePositionUsingName:(NSString *)name;
00046 - (void)savePositionUsingName:(NSString *)name;
00047 - (BOOL)setPositionUsingName:(NSString *)name;
00048 - (BOOL)setPositionAutosaveName:(NSString *)name;
00049 - (NSString *)positionAutosaveName;
00050 - (void)setPositionFromPlistObject:(id)string;
00051 - (id)plistObjectWithSavedPosition;
00052 
00053 @end
00054 
00055 @interface NSObject(KFSplitViewDelegate)
00056 
00057 // in notification argument 'object' will be sender, 'userInfo' will have key @"subview"
00058 - (void)splitViewDidCollapseSubview:(NSNotification *)notification;
00059 - (void)splitViewDidExpandSubview:(NSNotification *)notification;
00060 
00061 - (void)splitView:(id)sender didDoubleClickInDivider:(int)index;
00062 - (void)splitView:(id)sender didFinishDragInDivider:(int)index;
00063 
00064 @end
00065 
00066 // notifications: 'object' will be sender, 'userInfo' will have key @"subview".
00067 // The delegate is automatically registered to receive these notifications.
00068 extern NSString *KFSplitViewDidCollapseSubviewNotification;
00069 extern NSString *KFSplitViewDidExpandSubviewNotification;
